casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rahmil INGRAM 367P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2016 James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Ingram, Rahmil. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of October 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of October 2016."
